name: Solari
description:
Solari is a great puzzle game, you will be sent an unknown space! As a very angry asteroids to destroy all the other lovely planet! Tap screen rotation all the triangles stone,Let asteroids move in accordance with your wishes.Tap screen number determine your score,Smooth the edges of multiple collisions will cause rebound.Collision to highlight edge makes the asteroid exploded.
Make a brave asteroid, to explore, to conquer, to go beyond !
